root.name: Xenonauts
root.description: OverviewIn development by Goldhawk Interactive, Xenonauts aims to reinvent, rather than simply remake, the interesting gameplay dynamics found in the original X-Com games. Players will control the Xenonauts during the cold war, an independent organization formed to investigate extraterrestrial activity, funded by both NATO and the USSR.FeaturesXenonauts will include and expand on a lot of key features from the X-Com games, including:The geoscape.The GeoscapeStrategic Air Combat SystemBase Structure ConstructionResearch ManufacturingSoldier ExperienceDestructible TerrainSquad- and Turn-based CombatRandom Battlefield GenerationDevelopmentIn a Dev Diary article for PC Gamer US, the Studio Lead, Chris England, is quoted as saying "...weâ€™re hoping to have it out later this year." (meaning later in 2011).
